galoot
Class ContextStack

java.lang.Object
  galoot.ContextStack

public class ContextStack
extends java.lang.Object

The context class is a glorified map of variables/objects. It has in internal stack, which corresponds to the context depth.

getVariable

public java.lang.Object getVariable(java.lang.String key)
Returns the object with the given key. The object can reside in any of the maps in the stack, searching backwards from map on the top of the stack.

Parameters:
name -
Returns:
the object or null if not found

add

public void add(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
Add the items from the input map to the map on the top of the stack.

Parameters:
map -

removeVariable

public java.lang.Object removeVariable(java.lang.String key)
Removes the object with the specified key, only if it exists in the map on the top of the stack. There is an enforcement that you can not remove a value from a map lower on the stack.

Parameters:
key -
Returns:
